page.title: 19ALL ABOUT ME FROM CLAYPOLE
page.content: My name is Richard White and I live in Claypole. My birthday is on February 13th and I am eight years old. My mum's name is Josie and dad's is Paul. I have two brothers, David and Christopher. My best friend is Marc Tollerton. I live on Cleveland Farm in Claypole. The best time is harvest because we can play on the bales. I have a rabbit and a dog called Judy. My pet cow is called Buttercup and my pet sheep I have named Domino because he is black and white. I also have a budgerigar. I collect teddy bears and so far have thee hundred. China animals I also collect and I have sixty.My favourite toy is a game called Jungle Fever. If you have the right card you have to make the animal's noise and others have to guess it.
